data.script:

    <Box palette="negative" />

    <Box palette="affirmative" />
    <Box palette="negative" />

    <Box palette="alert" />

    <Box palette="affirmative" />
    <Box palette="negative" />
    <Box palette="alert" />

    <Box palette="negative" />
    <Box palette="alert" />
    <Box palette="affirmative" />

    <Box palette="alert" />

</style>
data.title: Responsivity Syntax
